title: Action Definition Schema
description: Defines the structure for a basic player or entity action within the game engine.

id.description: Unique identifier for this action definition (e.g., 'core:action_move', 'mod_combat:action_power_attack').

name.description: The primary display name or label for the action (e.g., 'Move', 'Attack', 'Take Item'). Might be a localization key later.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the action, potentially used for help text or tooltips.

commands.description: A list of command keywords or aliases that the player can use to invoke this action (e.g., 'go', 'walk', 'north', 'n'). Used by the input parser.

target_type.description: Optional hint indicating the expected type of target or parameter for this action (e.g., 'direction', 'item_in_room', 'entity_in_room', 'item_in_inventory', 'none').

requires_target.description: Indicates if the player must specify a target/parameter when invoking the action (e.g., 'move NORTH', 'take KEY'). Actions like 'look' might have this set to false.
